fact.description: The first-half is now underway.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Throw-in Iran.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Moses of Nigeria smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Nigeria’s Ogenyi Eddy Onazi and play has been suspended briefly.
The match in Curitiba is underway once more.
Goal kick for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Carlos Vera awards Iran a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Throw-in Nigeria.
Nigeria’s Ogenyi Eddy Onazi is on his feet again at Arena da Baixada.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Iran have a goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Iran.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a Nigeria throw-in in Iran's half.
Free kick Iran.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Iran awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Iran.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured John Obi Mikel.
Godfrey Oboabona is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
John Obi Mikel is back on the pitch.
Carlos Vera has blown to resume play in Curitiba.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Iran to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Godfrey Oboabona is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena da Baixada.
Carlos Vera awards Iran a goal kick.
Iran have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Arena da Baixada.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Can Iran get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Joseph Yobo (Nigeria) has replaced the possibly injured Godfrey Oboabona at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in Nigeria.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Nigeria's Ahmed Musa gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Throw-in for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick Iran.
Nigeria needs to be cautious. Iran have an attacking throw-in.
Carlos Vera blows against Iran's Ashkan Dejagah for offside.
Important block from the Nigeria defence as Reza Ghoochannejhad fires in a strike for Iran.
Iran have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Reza Ghoochannejhad (Iran) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nigeria defenders.
Carlos Vera signals a Iran throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Free kick Iran.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Ball safe as Iran is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Iran to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Carlos Vera signals a Nigeria throw-in in Iran's half.
Nigeria's Ogenyi Eddy Onazi breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Carlos Vera awards Iran a goal kick.
Goal kick for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Nigeria are pushing forward but Emmanuel Emenike's finish is wide of the goal.
Iran have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Iran close to the penalty box.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Iran get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Iran in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Carlos Vera signals a throw-in for Nigeria, close to Iran's area.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Iran in their own half.
Iran awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Reza Ghoochannejhad of Iran gets in a strike, but is off target.
Carlos Vera awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Iran.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Free kick Nigeria.
Shola Ameobi is on a sub for Victor Moses for Nigeria.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Throw-in for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Ball safe as Iran is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Nigeria.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a Nigeria throw-in in Iran's half.
Nigeria are coming forward and Emmanuel Emenike gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Iran have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Reza Ghoochannejhad for Iran gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena da Baixada.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Iran have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Free kick Iran.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Iran's Reza Ghoochannejhad misses with an attempt on goal.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Stephen Keshi (Nigeria) is making a third substitution, with Peter Odemwingie replacing Ramon Olamilekan Azeez.
The match at Arena da Baixada is underway again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Mehrdad Pooladi, who is grimacing with pain.
Iran awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mehrdad Pooladi for Iran is back on the field again.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Iran territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Iran goal kick.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Andranik Timotian (Iran) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nigeria's Ogenyi Eddy Onazi is on target but unsuccessful.
Carlos Vera awards Iran a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Arena da Baixada.
Alireza Jahan Bakhsh is replacing Ashkan Dejagah for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Goal kick for Iran at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick Iran.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Iran to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Throw-in Iran.
Andranik Timotian of Iran gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Iran in their own half.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Iran in their own half.
Throw-in for Iran in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
In Curitiba Nigeria drive forward through Shola Ameobi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Iran's half?
Iran make their second substitution with Masoud Shojaei replacing Khosro Heydari.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
2 minutes will be added to the second half.
Free kick Iran.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
